Quiz-App Settings
?>These are the Questions I've written them here to avoid hard coding in my XML file -->
How many bitcoins will ever be made? What is the technology behind Crypto Currency? Check All that are not Crypto Currency. When Did Bitcoin come into play? Which of the following is not true about crypto currency What is crypto currency mining? Who is governing crypto currencies? How do we store Bitcoins? Bitcoins have head office? Crypto Currency can be transferred internationally instantly and with very less fee Blockchain can be used in all of the following except?
Answer All the Questions Correctly Block Chain Submit Answers 50 Million 41 Million 21 Million type here Bitcoin US Dollar Dascoin Kenyan Shillings 2000 2009 1996 2017 Crypto Currency is doing away with the current banking system Crypto currency are decentralised They are only suitable for dark web They use old technology that is very easy to manipulate Digging solid crypto currencies from rocks Going dip under the sea to find minerals for making crypto currency All of the above None of the above No Yes Learn More about cryptos|+254792799958 By:Symons the Code Master|somborisymonss@gmail.com Version 1.0 This is me during mUzima hackathon ALC Author : Symons Ombori This is an app that asks questions about crypto currency. I made it as a project during the ALC with Google Africa Scholarship 2018. Feel free to get its source codes from git hub.Also lets talk in case you want to learn more about crypto currencies
